file.name: all-of-recursive.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.1"
info:
  title: Simple
paths:
  /pets:
    patch:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              allOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Cat'
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Dog'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Updated
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      type: object
      required:
        - pet_type
      properties:
        pet_type:
          type: string
      discriminator:
        propertyName: pet_type
    Dog:     # "Dog" is a value for the pet_type property (the discriminator value)
      allOf: # Combines the main `Pet` schema with `Dog`-specific properties 
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Cat'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
        - type: object
          # all other properties specific to a `Dog`
          properties:
            color:
              type: string
              format: "uuid"
            bark:
              type: boolean
            breed:
              type: string
              enum: [Dingo, Husky, Retriever, Shepherd]
    Cat:     # "Cat" is a value for the pet_type property (the discriminator value)
      allOf: # Combines the main `Pet` schema with `Cat`-specific properties 
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Dog'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
        - type: object
          # all other properties specific to a `Cat`
          properties:
            hunts:
              type: boolean
            age:
              type: integer

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /pets: patch: operation "": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: allOf: [0]: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Cat": parse schema: allOf: [0]: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Dog": parse schema: allOf: [0]: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Cat": infinite recursion: "#/components/schemas/Cat"
